com.topcoder.rules.engine
Class RuleSet

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.topcoder.rules.engine.RuleSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
RulesConstants
public abstract class RuleSet
extends java.lang.Object
implements RulesConstants

This class is called upon by the RulesEngine to evaluate Rules, Conditions, and Expressions. The source of an extending class is dynamically generated by the RulesEngine and loaded as a Class through the TCCompilerClassLoader.

See Also:
RulesEngine, TCCompilerClassLoader, RulesConstants

Method Detail

setMethods

public final void setMethods(java.util.Map methods)
Sets the Method Map of this RuleSet.

When a string method name is passed in as a parameter to the getValue, getCondition, or getRule methods. It will be looked up in this Map.

Parameters:
methods - the Map containing names as keys and Methods as values

name - The full-name of the value (Expression)
params - The parameters to the Expression
Returns:
the value of the Expression
